data.text: @cdvanwilligen @ZachFisherNews @WHO13news It's all they know how to do!  Legislation in search of a problem.
@ZachFisherNews @WHO13news AZ is not far behind. Fucking nonsense.
@ZachFisherNews @WHO13news Like most bills coming out of the Iowa legislature, we must ask: how does this protect and serve Iowans?
@cdvanwilligen @ZachFisherNews @WHO13news We all watched it happen, but the way Covid prevention has been polarly politicized is just crazy. I just don't get it.

@ZachFisherNews @WHO13news I work for the one college in Iowa that requires the vaccine, booster, and currently, masks in public spaces. We are proudly keeping our community safe. The ridiculous GOP should stop legislating for problems that don't exist and focus on supporting Iowans who are struggling.
